Posted By: JRSpaniel (12/23/2011 3:21:06 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Beefs up a creature and has cheap regen. Throw on a chump blocker and he can take out slightly bigger attackers. Or just put on anyone to make them immune to anything but bouncing and hard removal. Not saying it's a tournament winning card, but in sealed and casual play, it can definitely turn the tables.  
  
And I'd love to hear anyone's explanation for how they KNOW the skeleton is laughing. The soft tissue is gone. All you know is the mouth is open. He could be screaming in pain ( or anger, or terror, ) laughing, gasping, or in stunned silence. Without facial musculature, you have no lips, cheeks, eyelids, eyebrows, or anything else to tell what expression he would be otherwise wearing.
posts.html:
Beefs up a creature and has cheap regen. Throw on a chump blocker and he can take out slightly bigger attackers. Or just put on anyone to make them immune to anything but bouncing and hard removal. Not saying it's a tournament winning card, but in sealed and casual play, it can definitely turn the tables.

And I'd love to hear anyone's explanation for how they KNOW the skeleton is laughing. The soft tissue is gone. All you know is the mouth is open. He could be screaming in pain ( or anger, or terror, ) laughing, gasping, or in stunned silence. Without facial musculature, you have no lips, cheeks, eyelids, eyebrows, or anything else to tell what expression he would be otherwise wearing.
